Events that occurred on 7 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1924 - Composer Leonard Rosenman is born.
1926 - Voice actor Don Messick is born.
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to George Allen & Unwin concerning the promotion of The Hobbit.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 168.
1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 201.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 262.
1970 – The first Mythcon is held at Harvey Mudd Collegein Claremont, California.
1975 - Oxonmoot 1975 at the Welsh Poney, Oxford.
1989 - The Treason of Isengard is published in the UK.
1998 – Elfling goes online.
2000 - The Brazilian Tolkien society Conselho Branco, Sociedade Tolkien is founded.
2017 - The second edition of The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
